name: Fyde Treasury
description: Fyde Treasury Protocol enables the crypto ecosystem to diversify portfolios & treasuries, unlock token liquidity, and generate yield - all while retaining governance rights. The protocol introduces the Liquid Vault that creates multi-asset liquidity vaults directly accessible by the user's native governance token. Depositors into the vault receive $TRSY, the vault wrapper token, which tracks the vault performance and gives the depositor diversified market exposure, diversified yield, and additional liquidity pathways.
